content: तर, तरण, तरणि, तरंड, तरि-री, तरीष &c. See under तॄ.

तरणि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [तॄ-अनि] <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Passing through, pervading (as the sun). {@--2@} Quick, energetic, unremitting. {@--3@} Saving, carrying over, benevolent --णिः {@--1@} The sun. {@--2@} A ray of light {@--3@} The {%Arka%} plant. {@--4@} Copper. --णिः , --णी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} A raft, boat.
